title: "Your account has been transferred to another region"
body:
Hello, I'm a returning player who hasn't played League of Legends in many years. This is my main account (EUW), but I do have another account on NA that I used to use to play with some of my friends. The username is EDITED:DO NOT SHARE USERNAMES (Amy Ki is the IGN). For some reason, I can't seem to find my account anywhere! When I tried logging in, it said that my account had been transferred to another region. I proceeded to try out each region, yet couldn't find my account anywhere. So I was wondering what happened with it. Could it be possible to get my account back on NA, as I actually paid to have it transferred from EUW to NA a long time ago? I was able to receive emails related to said account and even change my password. I don't know what went wrong.

Thank you very much for your time and patience!

replies.body: I checked up on this for you, and this account hasn't ever been transferred to any region. It's still currently on EUW actually! You might be using the wrong username, just to be safe please reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some help!
Hey there, thank you for the reply! I'll send a ticket. :)
